meanings.definition: The quality or state of being gross.
meanings.sent1: The grossnesses of the situation made me feel sick.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't handle the grossnesses of the garbage left out for days.
meanings.sent3: The grossnesses of the food in the fridge was like a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: The grossnesses of the crime scene were overwhelming to the detective.
meanings.sent5: The slimy, smelly grossnesses of the swamp lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that are offensive or disgusting.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't stand the grossnesses of his rude comments.
meanings.sent2: The movie was full of unnecessary grossnesses that made her cringe.
meanings.sent3: The grossnesses of his jokes always made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The grossnesses of the prank went too far and upset many people.
meanings.sent5: The grossnesses of the behavior at the party was unacceptable.
